query:
SELECT
                s.id,
                s.title,
                s.cover_image_url,
                COUNT(svl.series_id) AS "view_count"
            FROM
                series s
            INNER JOIN
                series_view_log svl ON s.id = svl.series_id
            WHERE
                svl.viewed_at >= NOW() - $1::interval
            GROUP BY
                s.id
            ORDER BY
                view_count DESC
            LIMIT $2
